name: Red
description: Represents life and the strength of the LGBTQ+ community.

name: Dark Red
description: A darker variation of red, symbolizing deep passion.

name: Light Red
description: A softer tone of red, symbolizing warmth and acceptance.

name: Bright Red
description: A vibrant, energetic red.

name: Orange
description: Represents healing and the transition from life to stability.

name: Dark Orange
description: A deeper orange that symbolizes the richness of life.

name: Light Orange
description: A lighter tone that embodies warmth and friendship.

name: Bright Orange
description: An energetic and vivid shade of orange.

name: Yellow
description: Represents sunlight and positivity in the LGBTQ+ community.

name: Dark Yellow
description: A deep yellow that conveys strength and energy.

name: Light Yellow
description: A soft yellow that symbolizes light and hope.

name: Bright Yellow
description: A vibrant yellow that is full of energy and optimism.

name: Green
description: Represents nature, life, and stability.

name: Dark Green
description: A darker tone that represents strength and resilience.

name: Light Green
description: A lighter tone that symbolizes renewal and growth.

name: Bright Green
description: A bright green representing hope and progress.

name: Blue
description: Represents harmony, peace, and serenity.

name: Dark Blue
description: A deep blue representing trust and loyalty.

name: Light Blue
description: A soft blue that conveys calm and tranquility.

name: Bright Blue
description: A bright blue representing freedom and openness.

name: Purple
description: Represents spirit and the LGBTQ+ community's diversity.

name: Dark Purple
description: A deep purple symbolizing transformation and mystery.

name: Light Purple
description: A light purple representing beauty and compassion.

name: Bright Purple
description: A bright purple that symbolizes imagination and creativity.

name: Pink
description: Represents love, acceptance, and inclusion.

name: Hot Pink
description: A vibrant pink symbolizing energy and passion.

name: Deep Pink
description: A deeper pink shade symbolizing love and strength.

name: Pale Violet Red
description: A light pinkish red, representing tenderness and affection.

name: Medium Violet Red
description: A rich pinkish red representing boldness and power.
